original_title: La Leyenda Del Grano De Oro
overview: This is the story of Aaron, who has the fastest horse around. And as always, someone gets envious. Ramiro, Aaron's enemy, with the help of his cousin Toño, want to steal the "El Grano de Oro." But not satisfied with this, he also wants to steal Aaron's wife. To do this, this evil man hires the hitman known as El Pantera.
title: Legend of the Golden Grain
